description:
Age 10, Saggitarius, blood type O. Height 136cm, weight 30kg. Member of the Health Committee.
The main character, a bespectacled first grade boy who is aiming to become an excellent ninja. Unfortunately, he often gets distracted and prefers to goof off with his friends Kirimaru and Shinbee.
Source: Wiki
name: Inadera Rantarou
